member.name: T:PommaLabs.KVLite.Examples.WebApi.Controllers.CacheController
member.summary: Exposes the KVLite cache controller and allows further customizations.

member.name: M:PommaLabs.KVLite.Examples.WebApi.Controllers.CacheController.#ctor(PommaLabs.KVLite.ICache)
member.summary: Injects the dependency into the base controller.
member.param: The cache.

member.name: M:PommaLabs.KVLite.Examples.WebApi.Controllers.CacheController.DeleteItem(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes an item stored in the cache with given partition and key.
member.param: The partition.
The key.

member.name: M:PommaLabs.KVLite.Examples.WebApi.Controllers.CacheController.DeleteItems
member.summary: Deletes all items stored in the cache.

member.name: M:PommaLabs.KVLite.Examples.WebApi.Controllers.CacheController.DeletePartitionItems(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes all items stored in the cache with given partition.
member.param: The partition.

member.name: M:PommaLabs.KVLite.Examples.WebApi.Controllers.CacheController.GetItem(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a _valid_ item stored in the cache for given partition and key.
member.param: The partition.
The key.
member.returns: A _valid_ item stored in the cache for given partition and key.

member.name: M:PommaLabs.KVLite.Examples.WebApi.Controllers.CacheController.GetItems(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset},System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset},System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset},System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset})
member.summary: Returns all _valid_ items stored in the cache which follow given search criteria. Values are omitted, in order to keep the response small.
member.param: Optional, a substring that should be contained in the partition of the items.
Optional, a substring that should be contained in the key of the items.
Optional, the minimum expiry date items should have.
Optional, the maximum expiry date items should have.
Optional, the minimum creation date items should have.
Optional, the maximum creation date items should have.
member.returns: All _valid_ items stored in the cache which follow given search criteria.
member.remarks: Value is not serialized in the response, since it might be truly heavy.

member.name: M:PommaLabs.KVLite.Examples.WebApi.Controllers.CacheController.GetItemsWithValues(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset},System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset},System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset},System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset})
member.summary: Returns all _valid_ items stored in the cache which follow given search criteria. Values are included in the response.
member.param: Optional, a substring that should be contained in the partition of the items.
Optional, a substring that should be contained in the key of the items.
Optional, the minimum expiry date items should have.
Optional, the maximum expiry date items should have.
Optional, the minimum creation date items should have.
Optional, the maximum creation date items should have.
member.returns: All _valid_ items stored in the cache which follow given search criteria.

member.name: M:PommaLabs.KVLite.Examples.WebApi.Controllers.CacheController.GetPartitionItems(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset},System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset},System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset},System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset})
member.summary: Returns all _valid_ items stored in the cache for given partition which follow given search criteria. Values are omitted, in order to keep the response small.
member.param: The partition.
Optional, a substring that should be contained in the key of the items.
Optional, the minimum expiry date items should have.
Optional, the maximum expiry date items should have.
Optional, the minimum creation date items should have.
Optional, the maximum creation date items should have.
member.returns: All _valid_ items stored in the cache for given partition which follow given search criteria.
member.remarks: Value is not serialized in the response, since it might be truly heavy.

member.name: M:PommaLabs.KVLite.Examples.WebApi.Controllers.CacheController.GetPartitionItemsWithValues(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset},System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset},System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset},System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset})
member.summary: Returns all _valid_ items stored in the cache for given partition which follow given search criteria. Values are included in the response.
member.param: The partition.
Optional, a substring that should be contained in the key of the items.
Optional, the minimum expiry date items should have.
Optional, the maximum expiry date items should have.
Optional, the minimum creation date items should have.
Optional, the maximum creation date items should have.
member.returns: All _valid_ items stored in the cache for given partition which follow given search criteria.
